list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the flat area between the waist and knees of a seated person.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: come and sit on my lap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đến và ngồi trên đùi tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hanging flap on a garment or a saddle.
one circuit of a track or racetrack.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: heavy rain stopped the race after 18 laps
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mưa lớn dừng cuộc đua sau 18 vòng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cut to the depth and width of the lap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cắt theo độ sâu và chiều rộng của vòng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a single turn of rope, thread, or cable around a drum or reel.
(in a lapping machine) a rotating disk with a coating of fine abrasive for polishing.
the action of water washing gently against something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: listening to the comfortable lap of the waves against the shore
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nghe những chiếc đùi thoải mái trên bờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: overtake (a competitor in a race) to become one or more laps ahead.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she lapped all of her rivals in the 3,000 meters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô lùi tất cả các đối thủ của mình trong 3.000 mét

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: enfold or swathe a person or thing, especially a part of the body, in (something soft).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta bị thắt trong chăn

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the water lapped over the edges
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nước lung lên trên các cạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: polish (a gem or a metal or glass surface) with a lapping machine.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the honing and lapping of ring gauges
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các đồng hồ đo vòng và vắt nhẫn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an animal) take up (liquid) with the tongue in order to drink.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cat was lapping up a saucer of milk
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con mèo đang lapping một chiếc đĩa sữa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of water) wash against (something) with a gentle rippling sound.
